item.title: Interstellar
item.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

item.title: Inception
item.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

item.title: The Matrix
item.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

item.title: Avatar
item.description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

item.title: Dune
item.description: Paul Atreides leads nomadic tribes in a battle to control the desert planet Arrakis.

item.title: Tenet
item.description: Armed with only one word, a CIA operative must manipulate the flow of time to prevent World War III.

item.title: Blade Runner 2049
item.description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

item.title: Oppenheimer
item.description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

item.title: Barbie
item.description: Barbie suffers a crisis that leads her to question her world and her existence.

item.title: Mission: Impossible â€“ Fallout
item.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down stolen plutonium while being monitored by a CIA agent.

item.title: Joker
item.description: In Gotham's fractured society, Arthur Fleck transforms into the infamous criminal mastermind known as the Joker.
